trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento de <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint" /> .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event occurs when a control is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> evento ocorre quando um controle é redesenhado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.Graphics%2A> to use to paint the control and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.ClipRectangle%2A> in which to paint.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> Especifica o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.Graphics%2A> a ser usado para pintar o controle e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.ClipRectangle%2A> no qual a pintura.

trans-unit.source: For information about the event model, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre o modelo de evento, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> class to draw rectangles on the form.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra a manipulação de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> eventos e usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> classe para desenhar retângulos no formulário.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> events are handled to determine the size of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> eventos são tratados para determinar o tamanho do retângulo.

trans-unit.source: The example also demonstrates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A> method to invalidate the area of the rectangle, causing it to be redrawn.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também demonstra o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A> método para invalidar a área do retângulo, fazendo com que ele seja redesenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to paint the item.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> usado para pintar o item.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the rectangle in which to paint.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa o retângulo a ser pintado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> class with the specified graphics and clipping rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> com o gráfico e retângulo de recorte especificados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> identified by the `graphics` parameter is disposed when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> is disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> identificado pelo `graphics` parâmetro é descartado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> é descartado.

trans-unit.source: The following code examples draws lines and text on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Os exemplos de código a seguir desenha linhas e texto em uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle in which to paint.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o retângulo a ser pintado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> in which to paint.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que será pintado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância de um tipo que herda de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, nomear a instância `Control1` e certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.Dispose> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.Dispose> quando tiver terminado de usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.Dispose> method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.Dispose> método deixa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> em um estado inutilizável.

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.Dispose>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.Dispose>, você deve liberar todas as referências para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> para o coletor de lixo possa recuperar a memória que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> estava ocupando.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.Dispose> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.Dispose> antes de liberar sua última referência para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está usando não serão liberados até que o coletor de lixo chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> do objeto `Finalize` método.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> e opcionalmente libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo método público `Dispose()` e pelo método <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29> method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` invoca o método <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29> protegido com o parâmetro `disposing` definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro for true, este método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> referências.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o método `Dispose()` de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> pode ser chamado várias vezes por outros objetos.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, tome cuidado para não referenciar objetos que tenham sido descartados anteriormente em uma chamada anterior para <see langword="Dispose" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como implementar <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, consulte [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre <see langword="Dispose" /> e <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [substituindo o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Permite que um objeto tente liberar recursos e executar outras operações de limpeza antes de ser recuperado pela coleta de lixo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the graphics used to paint.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os elementos gráficos usados para pintar.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object used to paint.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> objeto usado para pintar.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object provides methods for drawing objects on the display device.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> objeto fornece métodos para desenhar objetos no dispositivo de vídeo.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> class to draw rectangles on the form.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra a manipulação de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> eventos e usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> classe para desenhar retângulos no formulário.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> events are handled to determine the size of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> eventos são tratados para determinar o tamanho do retângulo.

trans-unit.source: The example also demonstrates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A> method to invalidate the area of the rectangle, causing it to be redrawn.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também demonstra o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A> método para invalidar a área do retângulo, fazendo com que ele seja redesenhado.
